snippet: Bystanders caught a colorful eyeful on Wednesday at 5 p.m. when roughly 400 Pussy Riot supporters took to the streets in support of the Russian feminist punk collective.
abstract: Bystanders caught a colorful eyeful on Wednesday at 5 p.m. when roughly 400 Pussy Riot supporters took to the streets in support of the Russian feminist punk collective.

headline.main: Quiet Rioters | A Colorful Show of Support in Berlin
